about.description: Hello! I am a certified frontend developer, aspiring to create user-friendly and appealing user interfaces. I have a solid  understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript. I am committed to continuous growth and development. I am eager to join a team, learn through hands-on experience, and contribute to the advancement of projects.

freelance.name: Freelance
freelance.title: Frontend Developer
freelance.description: Developing а responsive web application using React and Redux. Using modern CSS frameworks to ensure an attractive and adaptive design. Collaborating with а team to meet goals within tight deadlines.

railContinent2.name: Rail Continent
railContinent2.title: System Administrator
railContinent2.description: Ensuring the stability of the IT infrastructure and the security of users. Maintaining the functionality of computers, office equipment and local networks.

railContinent.name: Rail Continent
railContinent.title: Technical Support Specialist
railContinent.description: Providing technical support to users, including fast issue resolution, software configuration, hardware component replacement. Diagnosing and troubleshooting computer, office equipment.

mati.faculty: Information systems and technologies, Informatics and computer engineering

kat.faculty: Information technology, maintenance от computer equipment and computer networks

item1.title: Green-API test work
item1.description: The task is to develop a user interface for sending and receiving WhatsApp text messages using the GREEN-API service.

item2.title: GraphiQL playground
item2.description: The task is to implement GraphiQL playground app. Google Firebase must be used for authentication with an email option. The application must be translated into at least two languages. The task must be completed in a team of 3 people.

item3.title: Rick and Morty API
item3.description: First React project. Exploring React function and class components, React hooks, React forms, React testing library.

item4.title: Online store
item4.description: The task is to create an online store of any subject. You choose the topic yourself. For example, it can be clothing, appliances, auto parts, sports, etc. The task must be completed in a team of 2 people.

item5.title: SongBird game
item5.description: Songbird is a quiz app for recognizing birds by their voices

item6.title: Gem puzzle
item6.description: The task is to implement the classic '15 puzzle game'

item7.title: Online Zoo
item7.description: The task is to create an adaptive website based on layout in Figma. Implement your own image slider.

item8.title: WORDLE game
item8.description: WORDLE game clone, with chat and results saving.

item9.title: Asteroids test task
item9.description: Online service for monitoring asteroids based on NASA API.
